processingCommand.script:
:SET &COPY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,COPY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:SET &DB_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)


:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)

:PUB &COPY_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &DB_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &DB_POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &DB_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &AUTOMIC_PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &TZ#

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

:IF &MODULES# = ""
:  PRINT "ERROR - No modules selected!"
:  SET &STATUS# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUN_ID#, "ENDED_CANCEL")
:ENDIF

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

! Source Major Version
:SET &SOURCE_MAJOR_VERSION# = '""'
:PUBLISH &SOURCE_MAJOR_VERSION#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID# = ""
:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &INSTANCE_NAME# = ""
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW

! RPTAB check
:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CHECK_RPTAB", 1)
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - configuration item is not defined value then it is nonproduction and will be assigned LATAM L2
:IF &CONFIGURATION_ITEM# <> GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TEST_NOT_CONFIGURATION_ITEM", 1)
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.COPY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:  SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN#
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
